greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 + x + sqrt(1 + 6*x + x^2))/2.
comment: This is the A-sequence for the Delannoy triangle A008288. See the W. Lang link under A006232 for Sheffer a- and z-sequences where also Riordan A- and Z-sequences are explained. O.g.f. A(y) = y/Finv(y) = 2*y/(-(1 + y) + sqrt(y^2 + 6*y + 1)) = ((1 + y) + sqrt(1 + 6*y + y^2))/2 with Finv the inverse function of F(x) = x*(1 + x)/(1 - x). The o.g.f. of the Z-sequence is 1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: G.f.: (1 + x + sqrt(1 + 6*x + x^2))/2. - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 04 2012
G.F.: G(0) where G(k)= 1 + x + x/G(k+1); (continued fraction, 1-step). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jan 04 2012
D-finite with recurrence: n*a(n) + 3*(2*n-3)*a(n-1) + (n-3)*a(n-2) = 0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 24 2012
a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * sqrt(3*sqrt(2) - 4) * (3 + 2*sqrt(2))^n / (2 * sqrt(Pi) * n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 12 2014
program: (PARI) {a(n) = polcoeff((1 + x + sqrt(1 + 6*x + x^2 + x*O(x^n)))/2, n)}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 07 2020 */
xref: A minor variation of A006318. See A085403 for yet another version.
Row sums of number triangle A112477.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 07 2005
